title: Siddaramaiah meets Rahul Gandhi amid Karnataka Cabinet rejig buzz
text:
Amid speculations over a reshuffle in the Karnataka Cabinet, CM Siddaramaiah met Lok Sabha Leader of Opposition Rahul Gandhi in New Delhi on Saturday.

Siddaramaiah, accompanied by Energy Minister KJ George had a 30-minute discussion with Gandhi at former AICC chief Sonia Gandhiâ€™s residence, sources said.
